statements: SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number, address FROM customer_data WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE last_name = 'Smith' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, address FROM customer_data WHERE source_info = 'Website' ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT address, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE last_name = 'Smith' ORDER BY address ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE source_info = 'Referral' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE birthdate BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE first_name = 'Alice' AND last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM marketing_data WHERE segment = 'VIP' ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT customer_id, lifetime_value FROM marketing_data WHERE lifetime_value > 5000 ORDER BY lifetime_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE birthdate > '1980-01-01';
SELECT * FROM marketing_data WHERE total_purchases >= 5 ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, segment, campaign_id FROM marketing_data WHERE lifetime_value > 1000;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, m.segment FROM customer_data c INNER JOIN marketing_data m ON c.customer_id = m.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_sources;
SELECT customer_id, source_name FROM customer_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customer_demographics WHERE state='California';
SELECT customer_id, total_spent FROM customer_activity WHERE total_spent > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, subscription_status FROM customer_activity WHERE subscription_status=true ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_sources;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM customer_demographics WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM customer_sources WHERE source_type = 'web';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_purchase_date FROM customer_demographics JOIN customer_activity ON customer_demographics.customer_id = customer_activity.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, total_purchases, total_spent FROM customer_activity WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING order_count > 3;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.price, c.category FROM products p JOIN products c ON p.product_id = c.product_id WHERE p.price > 50;
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, o.total_amount, c.first_name, c.last_name FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE o.total_amount > 1000;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.order_id, t.product_id, t.quantity, p.product_name FROM transactions t JOIN products p ON t.product_id = p.product_id WHERE t.quantity > 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, address, city, state, postal_code FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_date, type FROM interactions WHERE type = 'Feedback';
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT customer_id, address, city, state, postal_code FROM customers WHERE country = 'Canada';
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount, status FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, name, description, price, category FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
